document_data.name: Kungeya
document_data.mainbody: '''Kungeya''' was a [[shadovar]] knight in [[Anauroch]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1479 DR, Kungeya was chosen to by Captain [[Durbela]] to be part of the mission to gain control of the [[Spiral Gate]], a crucial [[portal nexus]].
document_data.Personality: Kungeya was very ambitious, trying to undermine [[Nulu]]. He consistently sought out the weakest opponents in combat.
